pages.text: $(item)Soul Alloy$() is vitally important in any and all endeavours involving summoning.$(p)Being composed mostly of basic metals it is quite sturdy and could also prove handy in the creation of tools.

A blend of $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuration_essence)Conjuration Essence$() and $(item)Iron Ingots$() adorned with a $(item)Nether Star$(), the $(item)Soul Slice$() is a formidable material. Its extraordinary powers facilitate the creation of ever stronger instruments, like the $(l:conjuring:basics/stabilized_conjuring_focus)Stabilized Conjuring Focus$().
